## cluster nootebook

聚类算法是将数据partition and segment, 

1. k-means
2. gaussian mixed
3. hierarchical clustering
4. DBSCAN stands for Density-Based Spatial Clustering and Application with Noise
5. Partitioning Around Medoids (PAM)
6. Level Set Tree clustering algorithm. Use the denpro R package. 



```{r}
library(cluster)
library(flexclust)
library(fpc)
library(fastcluster)
```
